hero.title: Crowdfunding · Invited
hero.description: Help us launch Invited: the 100% automated digital invitation platform for weddings and events. Zero paper, zero stress.

features.title: Why choose Invited?
features.feature1Text: Avoid printing and mailing. With our digital invitations, everything is faster and more affordable.
features.feature2Text: Choose your favorite template and add music to reflect the spirit of your celebration.
features.feature3Text: Your guests can confirm attendance, choose menu options, and report allergies. You’ll get notifications instantly.
features.feature4Text: Add the date, locations, and all key information for your guests, with an elegant on-screen timer.

inspiration.paragraph1: We’re Javier and Antonio, founders of Invited, a platform born in the Canary Islands with the desire to restore the essence of every celebration: human connection.
inspiration.paragraph2: We believe in the power of community. With your help, we’ll be able to:
inspiration.goal1: Consolidate the technological core – Two developers and one manager working for three months...
inspiration.goal2: Design premium templates – 20 exclusive designs in different styles...
inspiration.goal3: Launch an emotional marketing campaign – To reach couples, families, and professionals...
inspiration.paragraph3: Every euro raised will be transformed into hours of code, design, and messages saying: “Yes, we’ll be there!”
inspiration.commitment1: Total transparency: we’ll publish weekly updates and share the budget.
inspiration.commitment2: Quality and closeness: direct channel with backers for suggestions and questions.
inspiration.commitment3: Scalability: we’ll expand Invited to birthdays, baptisms and more if we exceed our goal.
inspiration.imageAlt: Javier and Antonio working on Invited

timeline.title: Delivery Timeline
timeline.step3Description: Supplier panel implementation and internal testing.
timeline.step4Description: Design and integration of 20 premium templates.
timeline.step5Description: Final testing (QA), adjustments, and full launch.

rewards.reward5Item1: Collaborative design of your own template
